test.name: mac_change_tx
test.objective: Check that MAC address can be changed and it affects source MAC address of sent packets.

test.name: mac_change_rx
test.objective: Check that MAC address can be changed and after that packets sent to the new address can be received.

test.name: ping
test.objective: Check that ping tool can ping Tester address from IUT.

test.name: read_sysfs
test.objective: Check that the files in sysfs related to the tested driver can be read.

results.notes: sfc_ef100 uses sfc name in debugfs

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

results.notes: intel/i40e does not provide debug in sysfs

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

results.notes: ice does not provide debug in sysfs

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

results.notes: igb does not provide debug in sysfs

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

results.notes: mlx5_core does not provide debug in sysfs, it uses mlx5 instead

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

results.notes: VirtIO net does not provide debug in sysfs

result.verdict: driver/interface subdirectory cannot be opened in /sys/kernel/debug/

test.name: send_receive
test.objective: Check that packets can be sent and received over the tested interface.

test.name: set_if_down
test.objective: Check that network interface can be set DOWN.

results.notes: UDP send in interface down state is delivered

result.verdict: Tester receives data sent after IUT interface was set DOWN

test.name: multicast
test.objective: Check that multicast packets may be sent and received over the tested interface.

results.notes: UDP multicast is not received

result.verdict: Checking multicast sending: receiver did not become readable
